header_section.title: Buy and sell Pepe Indonesia 24 hours
header_section.description: The largest Pepe trading platform in Indonesia since 2015. Easy, anytime & anywhere 24 hours without holidays. Triv is integrated with 61 banks & E-money in Indonesia, since 2015 Triv is used by millions of people to transact PEPE.

liquiditas.title: High Liquidity
liquiditas.content: Spread or the difference in the buying and selling price of Pepe Triv is one of the lowest in the market today. With our brokerage system you do not need to wait for other buyers / sellers to make transactions. All buying / selling transactions can be done instantly and in real-time without a waiting process.
liquiditas.content_3: in the market today. With our brokerage system you don't have to wait for other buyers/sellers to make transactions. All buy/sell transactions can be done instantly and in real-time without waiting.

regulator.title: Regulated and Insured
regulator.content: Since 2015 Triv has been used by millions of people, all customer funds in our system are insured by Bitgo and Lloyd England for 100 million USD or the equivalent of 1.45 trillion rupiah. Triv is an authorized broker registered and supervised by Bappebti.

layanan_section.title: What You Can Do With Triv Pepe Service Indonesia
layanan_section.title_1: What You Can Do With Triv
layanan_section.content: Triv supports a wide variety of transactions and not just buying and selling. Whether it's swaps, staking or anything else you can do in one application. Triv is the app with the most comprehensive features to manage and grow your portfolio.

jual_beli.title: Buy and sell Pepe 24 hours
jual_beli.content: Unlike traditional investment instruments, Crypto market has no holidays. You can sell your Pepe in real-time to your bank / e-wallet in seconds even on holidays.

kirim.title: Send Pepe
kirim.content: Send Pepe worldwide instantly, Crypto is the money of the future. You can also send Pepe to fellow Triv users for free without any fees!

terima.title: Receive Pepe
terima.content: Receive Pepe from all over the world to your Triv account instantly. Crypto is a financial ecosystem without borders.

hoddl.title: HODL Pepe
hoddl.content: Did you know? Historically proven that PEPE HODLERS get higher returns than PEPE traders. Store your PEPE in Triv with insurance from Bitgo & Lloyd England up to 100 million USD or equivalent to 1.45 trillion Rupiah

swap.title: Swap Pepe
swap.content: There are 1000+ supported cryptocurrencies in Triv platform and counting. You can enjoy the benefits of the 24/7 crypto staking service in real time.

isi_pulsa.title: Top Up Credit and Pay Bills
isi_pulsa.content: Exchange your PEPE coins to Triv rupiah wallet and use it for various purposes such as topping up credit, paying bills and even buying electricity tokens.

live_chat.title: Average LiveChat Responds
live_chat.content: Triv's Livechat and Call center are ready to assist you.

processing.title: Average Processing Time
processing.content: All Triv transactions run automatically and without downtime. Since 2015, Triv has never experienced downtime that disrupts customer transactions

ewallet_section.subtitle: 24/7 Real-time Deposits & Withdrawals
ewallet_section.description: All Triv rupiah deposits and withdrawals are processed instantly within minutes to various banks and e-wallets. Need funds in the middle of the night? Done! No need to wait until the next day.Unlike the stock and mutual fund markets, digital assets do not have holidays, all deposit and withdrawal transactions are processed 24 hours including on holidays.
